DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate two different diet effect weight loss measurement several risk factor cardiovascular disease . One diet high saturate fat diet ( HSFD ) low saturate fat diet ( LSFD ) limit fat especially saturate fat red meat . All participant study must eat diet randomize cross-over design .
DOC.brief_title: High Fat Diet II Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: In order qualify , participant must metabolic syndrome : triglyceride great 150 mg/dL blood pressure great 130 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure great 85 mmHg fast glucose great 110 mg/dL waist circumference great 40 inch men 35 inch woman reduce HDL le 40 mg/dL men le 50 mg/dL woman . Participants must capable perform symptomlimited maximal exercise capacity study . Blood urine sample collect baseline analyze CBC , serum glucose electrolyte , hepatic panel TSH . Participants exclude significant blood dyscrasia , fast glucose great 200 mg/dL , creatine great 2 mg/dL , significant electrolyte disorder , hepatic function great two time normal abnormal TSH .
